mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER(ID, PW, NAME, BIRTH, GENDER, EMAIL, PHONE) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select * from MEMBER order by MNUMBER

select count(*) from MEMBER
and ( ID like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or BIRTH like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or EMAIL like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or PHONE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or GRADE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or GENDER like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
